citations.narrative:
There is brown dirt and debris on the sides and floors of the primary enclosures. Inadequate cleaning of organic matter,
dirt, and debris can expose the guinea pigs to disease hazards and health problems. Correct by ensuring that walls and
floors are adequately cleaned when dirty and that primary enclosures are sanitized at least once every 2 weeks. Correct
by June 6, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.31(a)(1) 
   
Sanitation. 
There is brown dirt and debris on the sides and floors of the primary enclosures. Inadequate cleaning of organic matter, 
dirt, and debris can expose the guinea pigs to disease hazards and health problems. Correct by ensuring that walls and 
floors are adequately cleaned when dirty and that primary enclosures are sanitized at least once every 2 weeks. Correct 
by June 6, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
